oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Complementary root systems in organic intercropping of vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Xie, Yue
Kristensen, Hanne L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Recycling, balancing and resource management
Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The deep root system of the intercrop dyers woad complemented the shallow root system of leek without jeopardizing leek yields. These results show perspectives for reduction of nitrate leaching from leek production.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Xie, Yue and Kristensen, Hanne L. (2013) Complementary root systems in organic intercropping of vegetables. In: Complementary root systems in organic intercropping of vegetables.
